import React from "react"; import "./App.css"; import axios from 'axios'; import { render } from "react-dom"; import Navbar from './Navbar.js' import Footer from './Footer.js' class Comment extends React.Component { state = { movies: [] } componentDidMount() { // const ID = this.props.location.state.id axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/movies/5f4e23cd573a3f2e747a5ea5`) .then(res => { const movies = res.data; this.setState({ movies }); }) } render() { return (
{ this.state.movies.map(movie => (
{movie.description}

{movie.title}


Age Rating:
{movie.ageRating}

Actors:
{movie.cast}

Director:
{movie.director}

Genre:
{movie.genre}

)) }
